name: Rinkan Gakkou
overview: Tomoki Tsugawa is a somewhat effeminate-looking male college student aspiring to become a teacher. One day he meets a former schoolmate who is working as a teacher in a girls high school. He agrees to let Tomoki participate in the school's summer camp, under the condition that he wears woman's clothes and passes as a girl. Rinkan Gakkō plays like a visual novel, having no permanent menu and (with a few exceptions) no other way to interact with the environment but by selecting choices or locations to visit. The choices usually affect the storyline only in a minor way, and there is no possibility to die in the game.
